text: Post-grunge is a music genre that is strongly influenced by grunge music, a genre that started in Seattle, Washington, United States in the mid-1980s. However, it makes it into a more melodic and radio-friendly sound. Not by a coincidence, it has become very popular on the radio. ==Examples of post- grunge artists== *Default *Creed *Foo Fighters *Matchbox Twenty *Nickelback *Story of the Year *Puddle of Mudd *Three Days Grace *Daughtry ==References== Category:Music genres Category:Rock music
title: Post-grunge
